name: Eley Biathlon Club
lead: ELEY biathlon club is designed as the ideal introduction to ELEY’s world-class biathlon ammunition. This cartridge features a refined bullet and case design to ensure reliable cycling in bolt-action and straight-pull biathlon rifles, even in extreme winter conditions. A specialised cold-weather lubricant has been scientifically engineered to enhance consistency, reduce barrel wear, and maintain accuracy in freezing temperatures.
description: ELEY biathlon club is designed as the ideal introduction to ELEY’s world-class biathlon ammunition. This cartridge features a refined bullet and case design to ensure reliable cycling in bolt-action and straight-pull biathlon rifles, even in extreme winter conditions. A specialised cold-weather lubricant has been scientifically engineered to enhance consistency, reduce barrel wear, and maintain accuracy in freezing temperatures.

An increased propellant charge provides improved energy and greater knock-down power, ensuring reliable target reaction when it matters most. ELEY biathlon club delivers the accuracy, reliability, and cold-weather performance expected from ELEY.
